On 13 June, Bahrain's rulers commence the trials of 48 medical professionals, including some of the country's top surgeons, a move seen as the hounding of those who treated injured protesters during the popular uprising which was crushed by the military intervention of Saudi Arabia.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://english.aljazeera.net/video/middleeast/2011/06/201161373514815872.html |title=Bahrain medics on trial over protests - Middle East |publisher=Al Jazeera English |date= |accessdate=2011-06-14}}</ref>
On 13 June, Bahrain's rulers commence the trials of 48 medical professionals, including some of the country's top surgeons, a move seen as the hounding of those who treated injured protesters during the popular uprising which was crushed by the military intervention of Saudi Arabia.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://english.aljazeera.net/video/middleeast/2011/06/201161373514815872.html |title=Bahrain medics on trial over protests - Middle East |publisher=Al Jazeera English |date= |accessdate=2011-06-14}}</ref>
â
On 22 June, Bahrain sentences 10 activists to life in prison for their role in the uprising.<ref>{{cite web|author=Martin Chulov |url=http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/jun/22/bahraini-activists-jailed-life |title=Bahrain rights activists jailed for life | World news |publisher=The Guardian |date= |accessdate=2011-06-22}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://english.aljazeera.net/news/middleeast/2011/06/20116228219100399.html |title=Life sentences for Bahrain activists - Middle East |publisher=Al Jazeera English |date= |accessdate=2011-06-22}}</ref>
+
On 22 June, The Bahraini government sentences 10 pro-democracy activists to life in prison for their role in the uprising.<ref>{{cite web|author=Martin Chulov |url=http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/jun/22/bahraini-activists-jailed-life |title=Bahrain rights activists jailed for life | World news |publisher=The Guardian |date= |accessdate=2011-06-22}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://english.aljazeera.net/news/middleeast/2011/06/20116228219100399.html |title=Life sentences for Bahrain activists - Middle East |publisher=Al Jazeera English |date= |accessdate=2011-06-22}}</ref><ref>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-middle-east-13872206</ref>
